p: It has been determined that despite the complex causes of the novel S-O 2009 IV epidemic, airborne spread was one of the major reasons for the pandemic [ 7]. Aerosols are solid or liquid suspensions in the air and their particle size range is 0.001-100 Î¼m [ 8]. Once formed, aerosols, including those containing viruses, can rapidly spread to a larger area with the assistance of the wind [ 9]. However, little is known about the transmission and infection of the novel S-O 2009 IV via aerosols, and there is still some debate about airborne infection of this virus [ 7, 8, 10, 11].
